alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 6:20PM CDT until June 03 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Terrebonne Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South central Assumption Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Amelia, or near Stephensville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Terrebonne and south central Assumption Parishes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
